divs: Sighting Detailswe were coming out of the dollar theatre in la mirada around 11:30 pm, we were around our friends truck getting ready to leave talking about where to go eat when one of us noticed the flying saucer hovering on top of us not so far away, i and all the ppl coming out from the movie theatre saw, i was shocked, i couldnt belivev my eyes, we walked trying to see where it was heading, than the saucer made a sharp turn than no plane can make, it changed direction in a blink of an eye, the lights were going around it and flashing, like a yellowish whiteish color, wat i saw was real, it was something that will be unforgettable
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in La Mirada
There were no other sightings in La Mirada on or around July 31st 2011
Summary: never seen anything like it, what i saw was real
